This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
DefaultAssay(rat_merged) <- "RNA"
```

```{r}
rat_merged <- NormalizeData(rat_merged, verbose = F)
rat_merged <- FindVariableFeatures(rat_merged, selection.method = "vst", nfeatures = 2000, verbose = F)
rat_merged <- ScaleData(rat_merged, verbose = F)
rat_merged <- RunPCA(rat_merged, npcs = 50, verbose = F)
rat_merged <- RunUMAP(rat_merged, reduction = "pca", dims = 1:50, verbose = F)
```

```{r}
DimPlot(rat_merged, reduction = "umap", label = TRUE)
```


```{r}
DimPlot(rat_merged, reduction = "umap", split.by = "orig.ident") 
```
